column5: Absolutely not every drug is subjective you must be out of your mind.
Nah my girl would’ve noticed and said something immediately. Not everyone’s the same and all drugs act different on different people.
Oh yeah I knew when I was sick. Couldn’t sleep, headache beyond belief, crazy goosebumps, sweating but freezing all of that. Glad I’m back on subs.
My doctor said that’s a myth. You can eat, drink, or smoke and it’s fine right after.
Thanks for the advice. I did as you said and I’m feeling just fine now 36 hours after last use. Tomorrow I’ll get back on my normal 4mg dose.

I just took the test and told my doctor I may have smoked fentanyl laced weed as the person I did it with who I’m no longer associated with due to his lying and stealing was shooting fentanyl in front of me and I got tempted. So even if I pop he’ll know why and he’ll understand. As for the dosage I’ve been taking literal crums whenever I start feeling sick, tomorrow I think I’ll get back on 4mg or possibly taper to 3. Thanks for your help!
In my experience nothing but benzos helps my anxiety. 10 ssris and 5 other kinds of pills later klonopin is the only thing that helps.
I’m on both and definitely not a zombie. Also on a mood stabilizer so that could be preventing it.
My doctor prescribed me 16mg of subs a day and 6mg klonopin lmao. I only take 4mg a day of subutex tho.
Shit I’m on 6mg of kpins and 4mg of subutex a day and I’m doing just fine.
Just took a 2mg klonopin I’m prescribed and Tylenol. Hope this can hold me out just a bit longer.

Thank you very much I’m 36 hours in now, starting to get sick. I was stable on 4mg a day for months then this happened. Starting to feel sick, can’t sleep, bad headache, and a stomach ache. I’m gonna still try to keep pushing, what scares me is I see my sub doc today who drug tests me and I’m not sure if he’s looking for heroin or suboxone levels. Also scared that fent might pop on the screening and he cuts me off but I just gotta wait and see. I wanna wait as long as I can I might take 0.5mg right before walking into the doctors or hydrogen peroxide my mouth but afaik with all the fent analogs it won’t show at all unless there was heroin in it and I only took 2-3 bags smoked and it’ll be almost 3 full days since I did it so I’m hoping it’s out my system. Does that sound like a bad idea?

Thank you so much that was very helpful. It’s been ofer 24 hours just have a headache I’m gonna keep pushing on until I’m actually sick. I can’t thank you enough you prolly saved me from deadly withdrawal
I also have subutex and suboxone strips which should I take? It’s been almost 24 hours since last dose,
She sounds garbage. It’s your medication and it’s none of her business as long as it’s not affecting your relationship.
Can you smoke ____?
Rhodes 100%

you'll be okay, this want your fault. dm's akways open.

That was a comment of affirmation. I’m just stating a fact, didn’t ask if you cared. There’s way more than this going on then just that, this was just the only way I could’ve escaped the life I was in.
That’s the plan. She got my name tatted by her pussy for life I take the W
Only way for me to forget her and it’s impossible without drugs. Tried for 90 days. Took 4 1mg kilomopin only one more than recommended and drank a beer. Better option than dying tonight
Gonna drink a couple beers and black out. Never thought I’d be back here but I’m not even upset about it anymore. Now I don’t feel for her enough to make me feel meaningless

Really? They said it was bupe and gave me a shot last night and this morning. I’m gonna go try to find the discharge paperwork but I already redosed. I thought sublocade was an ass shot but they gave it to my arm lmao

Same shit. It all ends in sexual cheating and emotional cheating is no better. Take his phone, shouldn’t have an issue if he doesn’t have anything to hide but you also shouldn’t be in a relationship and think somethings being hidden because I promise you, there’s something

Better listen to the people of this sub cause there fucking right. Took my ex back after cheating and boom I knew she was being sneaky again. Turned out to be a lot deeper than that and was another 2 months of cheating I could’ve avoided if I trusted my gut and listened to people. Now I’m way worse off than before getting back with her.
Send a message going through this same shit right now but sadly not the first. Only time it mattered though
Love you too fam

Thank you so much! I truly know I deserve much better, had I done any of this to any other girl I know they’d have never done anything to risk to lose me. Her excuse last time was drugs and I chose to give her the benefit of the doubt because I had been addicted to benzos and the past and when I black out I’m absolutely not myself. But she also told me it’s because I made her feel insecure by calling her names like “whore” or “slut” in the past, which is truly the past. I was completely justified in the times I called her that, having alternate snapchat accounts, sending nudes, talking to ex’s a whole load of shit. I know she’s very self conscious, and wanting to really hurt her after first she threw a party lied to me about everything then invited me enemies, I started calling her out while driving and she hit me in the face. So that’s when I said she was a two and I can find much better looking. Now after catching her cheating 4 days ago and even forgiving her of that Bc I’ve lowkey been moving on because I knew in my heart I was still getting cheated on. The deal breaker was her having the snapxhar she said she did not have access to which was the reason for our original breakup on November 7th. It was her sending nudes to other guys from my bed. This snap account had a higher snap score than the one she talked to me and all her girlfriends on, because early on the relationship I caught her on tinder and a month later under the influence of Xanax she catches me talking to another girl, who lived across country and I never met. I had no issues blocking her immediately because I understand how much that hurt Bc she did the same but worse to me. We both made new snaps and only added people of our own gender, which in fact was her idea. This happened last March and it was a breaking point of our relationship all the way in November meanwhile during that span of months I caught her talking to at least 5 other guys including her ex. What really hurt me was back in February I took her to a concert for our second date and that night I told her I loved her and she said it back, she had posted a video on her Instagram of the concert and some guy replies aww your so lucky. She proceeded to respond it would’ve been better if I was with you. That shit hurt. Moving forward if I see something as small as that as a red flag I am ending it, or letting the girl know I can’t be in a relationship.

I love you too man thanks that comment meant a lot. If I told you half the things this girl did to me I would just look like a fucking fool for staying through all of it. I should’ve never saw her again after she threw a party, lied to me about having to go home so she’s get to her doctor appointment early the next morning and proceeded to invite my enemy, the kid that robbed my house and fed me drugs to promote a heavy relapse. I was put in a mental hospital after he robbed my house because I took so many pills after confronting me that I was gonna go back to his house and kill him my parents called the cops. I went to his house with my dad and thought I got all my shit back but when I realized he had an expensive designer shoe I downed mad pills and got on Instagram live and proceeded to burn every bridge I had. This kid truly ruined my life Im still debating picking up the paperwork I wrote on him and to file charges of terroristic threats solely because I am on probation. I purposely don’t go out antwhwre in my town any more out of fear of seeing him. Not of him. Kids a real pussy I know I can take him light work, I’m scared I’m gonna hurt him so bad that the only way he’ll survive is by calling the police. He knows I’m on probation and has done tons of manipulative tactics with my ex girlfriend. He ultimately convinced her I would always be cheating on her to try to fuck her and he knew she wouldn’t say she talked to him so she just believed everything until I found out weeks later.
Thanks man!

Lmao shit I could only lie to myself so much pretending I believed that she no longer had a snapchat. I knew deep down she did but she wouldn’t admit it. Welp yesterday I edited and changed up photos on an account and dm’d her asking for her snap. Bitch never got the chance to reply before I saw she hid her insta story from me, she was with a girl I click on her page and on that girls story it had a screenshotted picture from her snapchat. She tried lying her way out of that until while she was lying she proceeded message my bait account her snap name and that’s when I called her out and called her every hurtful thing I possibly could think of before she hung up. For a couple hours I was constantly calling trying to get closure but there’s no closure necessary she cheated on me while I was in a mental hospital last week, albeit I was also at the hospital because she leaked a private voicemail of me crying when I broke up with her before and they just decided to post it on Twitter. I freaked out and wanted to die again and even though she would talk to me every/other day on the phone while I was there she at the least kissed another guy and posted a pic of him kissing her cheek on her finsta and she thought I’d tell her the day I was getting out but I got released earlier in the day and she forgot to delete it. I was willing to forgive that but now I know she’s sending nudes to a million guys again and I’m over it. Besides I found a girl who lives in my town instead of my ex who moved across the country for rehab after our last break up.
Imodium is a low dose opiate??

Funny thing is she’s from the worlds richest country, Dubai and using one of America’s cheapest drugs. She didn’t even spend a year in this country before all this. I got in a relationship with her two days after she moved here. I live on the east coast and prior to her telling he she was using meth, I didn’t even know meth existed over here. I would’ve never involved myself with a methhead either it’s just insane. You think of meth as like the faces of meth you see on google but this girl remained gorgeous, over a heathy weight and would eat as well as sleep. It’s all so confusing. It’s because we live in different states and even though I spent 4 days a week with her, I thought I knew what was going on the other 3 but I really didn’t. She’d also be shooting up in her scars that she got from cutting, so I’d never notice.
Cyclobenzaprine is so nice with gaba. Too relaxing I fell asleep holding my bong and spilled it all over my new mattress lmaooo
Merinol needs to be prescribed to you right? I’m assuming your In a non-legal state?
Def not true. First 5-10 taking Sübutex orally in rehab had me nodding.
Here I am a 4-6 and I haven’t noticed any withdrawal yet. I’ve only been taking a dose a day for a little while now and haven’t had any withdrawal yet.
8 days later and I’m somehow down from 12mg for a week to 8mg for like 5 days but I’ve never even taken 8, I’ve been taking 4-6 just because I forget the second dose.

I’m down to at most 8mgs a day now, it hasn’t been bad at all. For the past 5 or so days I’ve only been taking 4-6mg a day just because I forget to take my second dose and end up just falling asleep. It’s already 8pm and I haven’t taken a dose all day yet. Gonna take 4mg just to stop any withdrawals Incase they are coming.

Thanks man! I’m already starting to drop I’m down from 16mg/day to 12mg for a week, and now about 4-6 the last 5 days solely because I’ve been forgetting to take doses because I feel fine then I realize and I’ve had no withdrawals. I feel like I’m gonna get off a lot sooner than I expected!

Saying it how it is, I like it. She really is just a sack of manipulation, but for some reason I accepted it for I’d say 4ish months? That’s when shit started going really downhill then I’d forgive her or she’d forgive me for something and the next thing she’d do would be much worse. At the end of the day, maybe it’s good I got to talk to her these last few days. Even though I spent most of our time talking crying solely because I can look at her and then try to think about what she did to me and it just causes me to break down. How could such a tiny cute girl cause me all this pain and agony. The only quick fix I’d get out of her is sex and I don’t know if she ever fucked anybody else while we were together, so I don’t even want that. These last few days have been painful talking to her, A lot of crying, weather it’d be on the phone or by myself. I don’t need to relive all this shit. Today i haven’t cried and I think that’s because I got some closure, I’m sure it’s not all the closure their is, but the longer I stick around the deeper the hole gets.!. I wish I still hated her. I really wanted her dead until emailed me and explained what happened to her, but she was doing all these drugs willingly, sneakily. I’ve done drugs and ended up catching a felony. She did drugs then cheated. There’s real consequences to shit you do on drugs. I’m on probation for my mistake on drugs, and she thinks she can just have me back like i never left her... no. Her consequence just equals me moving on.

I’m gonna do it. I think I’ve gotten my closure and if I haven’t I’m never gonna get it. I was too busy trying to understand how all of this happened and when I looked around I was falling back to her. At the bottom of my heart I know she never deserves me, but I sure do wish she did. I know it’s better for me to be alone than be with her and be lonely, because that’s the only two options. I feel more loved right now just by myself and own self-care then I ever did the last few months of that relationship. Everything went to shit and her cheating was just icing on the cake. That was gonna be the only way I would have ever left, even though she did a lot of fucked up shit I could always find a way to forgive her. This is something I can forgive over years, but forgiving someone doesn’t mean getting back with them. Thank you for the kind words and I sure do hope one day I’ll find someone deserving of my love and trust.
I’ll pm if that’s okay

It’d be possible, doesn’t matter how much of a fighter you are. What the jury says when you go to trial sticks. I’m sorry but your speaking on things you don’t really know. When your depressed you can’t just “magnet positivity” and no longer be depressed. If that was the case depression would not exist. You can’t find positivity in jail, trust me on that.

Don’t plan on moving up the side effects were so shitty that if I don’t feel better with this lll try a different anti depressant.
I got a med card and I’m tryna taper from 16mg to like 2mg. I just wanna be able to feel the subutex again and not have a huge pill dissolving for an hour.

Apparently Rhodes hit a lot harder probably due to being more bio available. I have the 8mg tabs and didn’t notice a difference between Rhodes and Actavis.

I’m on wellbutrin and subutex right now. They are not at all similar medications. Welbutrin works more as a stimulant and interacts with completely different parts of the brain.  I don’t think it would help at all with withdrawals based on the way it works for me.

Wait NA is actually supportive of weed? When I went to rehab they brought in NA speakers and I asked about medical marijuana they said no mind altering substances are allowed. That kinda turned me off weed is my medication. If I don’t smoke I have ptsd related night terrors were I wake up screaming and cursing or throwing punches. That’s just not something I can live with and I’ve tried every sleeping pill out there. Nothing stops the dreams most of them just make them 10x worse.

I knew it wasn’t gonna be one of those situations so I had to start recording. When I got my parents to call the cops cause she was going crazy and needed a mental hospital she jumped out my car. She’ll never get her shit together she’s too hardheaded and a pathological liar. Nobody knows the truth about her not even her family.

21. This kid was my best friend I let him stay at my house when he was homeless and when I became homeless I let him sleep in my car. Then one day I’m in the bathroom and this kid steals a suitcase from me filled it with thousands of dollars of designer clothing and put in the trunk of my car. I go to drop him off and he says pop the trunk and I see him take out a suitcase and I hopped out the car knowing he didn’t bring a suitcase. I opened it and it’s all my clothes and shoes. Then I realized he had a pair of $750 shoes so I went back with my dad and another kid Bc I’m on probation and I needed to be held back. Kid was a pussy and wouldn’t fight me or my dad. He got in my dads face and my dad pushed him back. Long story short he told me lies about me to my ex while I was in a hospital with no phone or contact with the outside world. Then he continues sending death threats to me about killing me and my dad and punching my mom in the face. It’s continuous. All this happened October 4th and he’s still messaging me threats.

I would’ve loved to kick her out but she was hitting herself in the face to cause bruises and she said she’d call the cops and say I did it. I was too scared of her doing that so I had my parents call the cops to be there when I got home Bc she really needed mental help. She didn’t get any. They just sent her right back first ER.

I wish these were lies. You got no idea what I been through with this bitch. It’s funny that you think these are lies that just shows me how fucking stupid I am for staying with this girl for 10 months when I should have dropped her when I caught her on tinder a month into the relationship.!
